game

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Castle, Troop

    public abstract class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents the sprites of the games
    Author:
    Moi

              double x,
              double y)
        Construct a sprite
        Parameters:
        layer - Layer in which the sprite must appear (@see Pane)
        img - Image that will be displayed for this sprite
        x - Position x on the screen
        y - Position y on the screen
